results.content:
A very complete course for people with no experience.
The speed of the mouse is to high so you have to slow down the video. However the voice is getting silly.
Because it's for beginners, all the issues are solved with plugins. Quite a lot.
Some plugins mentioned are outdated.
No answers to questions :-(

results.content:
This course was just what I was looking for.  Maya presents the material concisely.  There is no extra fluff or wasted time.  Her presentation is both easy to understand as well as comprehensive.  For anyone who needs a game plan for building a community and bringing BuddyPress up quickly and accurately, Maya offers a step-by-step guide to BuddyPress through this course.

In particular, I appreciated her presentation of various sites that are using BuddyPress as both examples of what can be done for particular needs as well as the flexibility that can be accomplished.

Finally, throughout the course, Maya offers a number of additional plugins that can enhance BuddyPress.

Wonderful course, well designed by an excellent instructor.  If you need to get up and running with BuddyPress as quickly as possible, this is the course to take. You won't go wrong.

results.content: A clear and detailed tutorial that definitely helps making sense of BuddyPress for anyone unfamiliar with the platform. As of June 2020, some of the WordPress interface has changed, but everything dealt with here is still active and useable.

results.content:
I have only gotten through Lesson 30, but I have learned more in that short time than any other Udemy course (or any vendor's course, for that matter).

Maya does an great job of explaining what she is doing and how she does it. And she does so without wasting the viewer's time with extraneous material that has very little to do with the subject at hand.

results.content: Maya has put together a fantastic course that hits not one but two topics at the same time. You get over the shoulder training on getting hosting, installing WordPress, and setting it up as well as all the information content for setting up the community site. The best part in my opinion is this can be done with the free software. I enjoyed this… it was a fantastic learning experience that I’m glad I found because I am going to create this exact same community site for my existing business. Well done Maya!
